text: Hi everyone! I’m Harsh from India. I’m currently doing PhD in Statistics at the University of Tennessee. I’ve been using R for around five years and have navigated around the block of statistical modelling in R. I’m now looking forward to more open source contributions and engagement with the community. Two months ago, I started a newsletter on R (<http://harsh17.in/next|harsh17.in/next>) which gained more than a hundred subscriber in a week of launch.
